explanations.reason: The paper focuses on financial constraints, distress risk puzzle, and asset pricing models in the context of the Vietnam stock market, particularly before and during the Covid-19 pandemic. The methodologies mentioned include portfolio sorting, Fama Macbeth regression, and asset pricing models, none of which are related to machine learning or any of its subfields or techniques listed in the keywords. The study does not employ any machine learning algorithms, neural networks, or related methodologies.
